integration.title: FastEditor Integration
integration.description: Before using FastEditor, connect your store to the platform via the Settings page.

customization-button.title: Customization Button
customization-button.description: Add a customization button to your product page template and style it to match your theme.

product-setup.title: Product Setup
product-setup.description: To link a Shopify product with FastEditor, follow these steps:

steps.item-1: Create or select a product in Shopify.
steps.item-5: You'll land on the product details page.
steps.item-6: Select the filters you want to use.
steps.item-9: Return to the product settings in Shopify.
steps.item-10: If the product has no variants: paste the SKU into the SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) field in the Inventory section and save your changes.
steps.item-11: If the product has variants: open the specific variant, paste the SKU into the SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) field in the Inventory section and save your changes.

product-setup.display-button-description: To display the customization button on the product page:

display-steps.item-1: Open the product you want to customize.

products-table-info.title: Products with the FastEditor tag
products-table-info.description: The table below shows products tagged with fasteditor.

steps.item-3: In the Tags section, enter fasteditor and press Enter

empty-state.title: No products yet
empty-state.description: Make sure your products have the fasteditor tag.

products-table.search-placeholder: Search by product title or SKU

error-banner.title: We couldn't load your dashboard data

messages.item-1: The data couldn't be found based on your current filters.
messages.item-2: If the issue persists, try refreshing the page or contact support.

integration-card.title: Connect Your Store to FastEditor
integration-card.description: To connect your store, enter your FastEditor API Key and Domain below, then click Connect. If the connection is successful, you will see a confirmation message and the status will update to Connected. If you have any issues while connecting FastEditor, please contact our support. You'll find the email at the bottom of the page.

integration-form.connection-failed-error: Connection to FastEditor failed. Please check your API Key and Domain and try again.

cancel-modal.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel-modal.confirm-question: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
cancel-modal.confirm-description: If you cancel your subscription, access to all paid features will be revoked, and you won't be able to use the remaining paid period.

home-page.heading: A short heading about FastEditor
home-page.tagline: A tagline about FastEditor that describes your value proposition.
home-page.product-feature-description: Some detail about your feature and its benefit to your customer.

no-subscription-page.heading: Activate your subscription to continue
no-subscription-page.description: To continue using FastEditor, please activate your monthly plan. You will be redirected to billing page to confirm your subscription.

usage-limit-banner.title: Usage limit exceeded
usage-limit-banner.description: Your current usage has exceeded the allowed limit for this billing cycle. As a result, the application is temporarily unavailable.
usage-limit-banner.list-item-1: Access to all app features is blocked until the usage limit is increased or the billing cycle resets.
usage-limit-banner.list-item-2: To restore access, please review your subscription plan or increase your usage limit in the settings.

login.missing-shop: Please enter your shop domain to log in
login.invalid-shop: Please enter a valid shop domain to log in

footer.support-text: Need help? Contact our support team at
